tool_description: Empower Your App with Muslim Companion API
name: Muslim Companion
title: Muslim Companion

api_list.name: Events

required_parameters.name: date
required_parameters.description: Represents the date of a prayer in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC). The date format is expected to be 'yyyy-mm-dd'.

optional_parameters.name: hijri_day_adjustment
optional_parameters.description: Optional adjustment for Hijri day calculation. Positive values indicate forward adjustment, while negative values indicate backward adjustment. Use this to fine-tune Hijri day calculations based on specific requirements or observations.
